thread.title: VIDEO: Honda BR-V crossover full walk-around tour
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Honda BR-V crossover full walk-around tour

author: Gerard Lye
title: VIDEO: Honda BR-V crossover full walk-around tour
text:
Home » Cars » VIDEO: Honda BR-V crossover full walk-around tour VIDEO: Honda BR-V crossover full walk-around tour / 7 comments 
We now bring you’re a walk-around video tour of the new Honda BR-V, which was launched earlier this month , and has since been well received by car buyers in the country. Offered in two variants – E and V, both are offered with just a single engine option – a 1.5 litre SOHC i-VTEC four-cylinder (120 PS/145 Nm. 
The seven-seat vehicle retails from RM85,800 (OTR with insurance) for the E variant, and RM92,800 for the V. Built on a stretched version of the Brio platform, the BR-V (or Bold Runabout Vehicle) offers seating for seven people, and those seats can be configured to offer more cargo space as well. 
Seen here is the top-spec V, which comes with all the bells and whistles like additional chrome trim, a 6.1-inch touchscreen display audio system, leather upholstery, as well as a reverse camera. As you’ll see in the video above, the BR-V has plenty going for it. 
For more information of the Honda BR-V, do check out CarBase.my , along with our review of the seven-seater , where we share our thoughts about it. Research Honda Cars at
